about_the_game:
This is a classic puzzle game that tests your logical thinking. Playing it daily can improve your reasoning skills and delay cognitive decline.

The protagonist, Fluffy, lives in an underground cave and can't stand the mess of boxes. Push the boxes to the smiling face position to complete the cave tidying.

Classic Game Screen with a Cute Character Makeover

The classic pixel-style screen, combined with GameBoy retro style and cute characters, will not cause excessive eye fatigue, bringing you a different Sliding Block experience.

Challenging Levels with Ingenious Level Design

The difficulty of the levels increases step by step. Come and challenge yourself to see how far you can get! During the process, you may encounter situations where the boxes cannot be moved or are pushed into a dead end. Don't worry, just start over. The most important thing is to learn from mistakes, strive not to make the same mistakes next time, make full use of the limited space, arrange the order and position of movement reasonably, and ultimately pass the level.

Abundant Number of Levels for All-Round Challenges

Abundant levels provide ample challenges and thinking opportunities. We have created nearly 100 interesting levels waiting for your challenge. Some levels may seem simple but could take you several hours or even longer. Some levels may seem complex, but as long as you are willing to take the first step and think carefully step by step, success is not far away.

Game Features

  • Cute style, adorable characters, and a green theme that will not cause excessive eye fatigue.

  • Comprehensive hints, when you are puzzled and even doubt there is no solution, you can freely get help in the game.

  • Undo function, you can undo when you make a mistake.

  • Leaderboard function, compete with global players in intelligence freely.
